name: PrimaryCareProvider
title: Primary Care Provider
description: This value set represents physicians, practitioners, certified nurse specialists and registered nurses who deliver primary care medical services.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Identify events where the servicing provider is a primary care provider (PCP).),(Data Element Scope: Practitioner / provider),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes: General and family practice physicians, geriatricians, general pediatricians, nurse practitioners and physician assistants.),(Exclusion Criteria: Obstetricians and gynecologists (OBGYN). Licensed practical nurses and registered nurses are not considered PCPs.)
